title: Bug 109718: Large content in text item causes the tips to show in one line
description: When putting large content in a text item, the tips are expected to show the content in a given format. However, the actual result is that the tips show the content in one line.
OB: When putting large content in a text item, the tips show the content in one line.
EB: The tips should show the content in the given format.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Insert a text in the layout and enter the following content: 'Contents1. MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMETNDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4 CURRENTLY WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTYFILE. NEW FEATURES 53.1 RHINO EXPRESSION PARSER 53.2 STRUCTURE TYPE SUPPORT 63.3 NEW SYSTEM 64. QA TEST SUPPORTING 7'.
